mapper.select: SELECT no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT rownum rn, no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.title title, u.name name, b.hit hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, b.user_no user_no FROM board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc)) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.user_no, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no(+) and b.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = sysdate where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete board where no = #{no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT rownum rn, no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.title title, u.name name, b.hit hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, b.user_no user_no FROM board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by no desc) ) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(*) count from board where title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no};
